Title: Deploy frontend (Vercel/Netlify) pointing to deployed backend
Milestone: M4 - Deploy + Evidence Pack
Labels: deploy,frontend,docs

## GitFlow Branch
- feature/M4-02-deploy-frontend

## Goal
Deploy frontend and connect it to the deployed backend.

## Functional Requirements
- Deploy frontend
- Configure `VITE_API_BASE_URL` (or equivalent)
- Ensure UI can execute and clear flows

## Non-Functional Requirements
- Responsive UX on mobile
- Stable URL

## Acceptance Criteria
- Public URL shows table and buttons.
- Execute and clear works end-to-end.

## Deliverables / Evidence
- `docs/evidence/M4-deploy.md` includes:
  - frontend URL
  - backend URL
  - screenshots placeholders
